alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 04 at 4:51AM EDT until July 04 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Water up to Bachelder Road in Allenstown. Waterfront campsites impacted, campers should move to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 7.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:15 AM EDT Tuesday was 7.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 4.6 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
